item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="06680" class="">Command</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>:<n id="1" /> ‘With regard to my <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08104" class="">be sure</st> to <st data-num="07126" class="">offer</st><n id="3" /> my <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> for my <st data-num="0801" class="">offering made by fire</st>, as a <st data-num="05207" class="">pleasing</st> <st data-num="07381" class="">aroma</st> to me at its <st data-num="04150" class="">appointed time</st>.’<n id="4" />
You will say to them, ‘This is the offering made by fire that you must offer to the Lord: two unblemished lambs one year old each day for a continual burnt offering.

The <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">lamb</st> you must <st data-num="06213" class="">offer</st> in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>, and the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">lamb</st> you must <st data-num="06213" class="">offer</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="06153" class="">late afternoon</st>,<n id="1" />

with <st data-num="06224" class="">one-tenth</st> of an <st data-num="0374" class="">ephah</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="05560" class="">finely ground flour</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="07243" class="">one-quarter</st> of a <st data-num="01969" class="">hin</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="03795" class="">pressed</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>.
It is a continual burnt offering that was instituted on Mount Sinai as a pleasing aroma, an offering made by fire to the Lord.
“‘And its drink offering must be one-quarter of a hin for each lamb. You must pour out the strong drink as a drink offering to the Lord in the Holy Place.

And the second lamb you must offer in the late afternoon; just as you offered the grain offering and drink offering in the morning, you must offer it as an offering made by fire, as a pleasing aroma to the Lord.
“‘On the Sabbath day, you must offer two unblemished lambs a year old, and two-tenths of an ephah of finely ground flour as a grain offering, mixed with olive oil, along with its drink offering.
This is the burnt offering for every Sabbath, besides the continual burnt offering and its drink offering.
“‘On the first day of each month you must offer as a burnt offering to the Lord two young bulls, one ram, and seven unblemished lambs a year old,

with <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st>-<st data-num="06241" class="">tenths</st> of an ephah of <st data-num="05560" class="">finely ground flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st> for <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, and <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st>-<st data-num="06241" class="">tenths</st> of an ephah of <st data-num="05560" class="">finely ground flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st> for <st data-num="0259" class="">the</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>,
and one-tenth of an ephah of finely ground flour mixed with olive oil as a grain offering for each lamb, as a burnt offering for a pleasing aroma, an offering made by fire to the Lord.

For their <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offerings</st>, <st data-num="01961" class="">include</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> a <st data-num="01969" class="">hin</st> of <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> with each <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="07992" class="">one-third</st> of a <st data-num="01969" class="">hin</st> for the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="07243" class="">one-fourth</st> of a <st data-num="01969" class="">hin</st> for each <st data-num="03532" class="">lamb</st>. <st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> for <st data-num="02320" class="">each</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st><n id="2" /> throughout the <st data-num="02320" class="">months</st> of the <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st>.
And one male goat must be offered to the Lord as a purification offering, in addition to the continual burnt offering and its drink offering.
“‘On the fourteenth day of the first month is the Lord’s Passover.

And on the <st data-num="02568 06240">fifteenth</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st> is the <st data-num="02282" class="">festival</st>. For <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> <st data-num="04682" class="">bread made without yeast</st> must be <st data-num="0398" class="">eaten</st>.
And on the first day there is to be a holy assembly; you must do no ordinary work on it.
“‘But you must offer to the Lord an offering made by fire, a burnt offering of two young bulls, one ram, and seven lambs one year old; they must all be unblemished.

And their <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st> is to be of <st data-num="05560" class="">finely ground flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>. For each <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st> you must <st data-num="06213" class="">offer</st> <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st>-<st data-num="06241" class="">tenths</st> of an ephah, and <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st>-<st data-num="06241" class="">tenths</st> for the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>.

For <st data-num="03532 0259">each</st> of the <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">lambs</st> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">offer</st> <st data-num="06241 06241">one-tenth</st> of an ephah,

as well as <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>, to <st data-num="03722" class="">make atonement</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> you.

You must <st data-num="06213" class="">offer</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">in addition to</st> the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is for a <st data-num="08548" class="">continual</st> <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>.

In this manner you must offer daily throughout the seven days the food of the sacrifice made by fire as a sweet aroma to the Lord. It is to be offered in addition to the continual burnt offering and its drink offering.
On the seventh day you are to have a holy assembly, you must do no regular work.
“‘Also, on the day of the firstfruits, when you bring a new grain offering to the Lord during your Feast of Weeks, you are to have a holy assembly. You must do no ordinary work.
But you must offer as the burnt offering, as a sweet aroma to the Lord, two young bulls, one ram, seven lambs one year old,

with their <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">finely ground flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>: <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st>-<st data-num="06241" class="">tenths</st> of an ephah for <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st>-<st data-num="06241" class="">tenths</st> for the <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>,
with <st data-num="06241 06241">one-tenth</st> for <st data-num="03532 0259">each</st> of the <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">lambs</st>,

as well as <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> to <st data-num="03722" class="">make an atonement</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> you.
You are to offer them with their drink offerings in addition to the continual burnt offering and its grain offering—they must be unblemished.
